Format ae_format88 - 88 bit(s) 11111
SQRT0.S 1011111 1 01011
fld_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vt 3210
fld_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vr 321 0

Assembler Syntax

SQRT0.S aed0..15(opnd_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vt), aed0..15(opnd_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vr)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_FP.h>

extern xtfloat XT_SQRT0_S(xtfloat s);

Description

(please consult the Xtensa ® Instruction Set Architecture Reference Manual for any cross references and additional information)

SQRT0.S is the first step of a Newton-Raphson square-root sequence which includes corrections to make it an IEEE compliant square root. The single-precision argument in each half of data register frs first has its range narrowed in the same way as the NEXP01.S instruction, but without the negation. A rough approximation of the reciprocal square root of that result is computed by table lookup and placed in frr. No status flags are updated. .

Operation

For each corresponding half: 

AE_DR[r] ← begin_square_root_sequence(AE_DR[s])

Exceptions

  • EveryInst Group
  • GenExcep(Coprocessor0Disabled) if Coprocessor Context Option

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
opnd_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vr Mstage opnd_vfpu2_sem_spmisc_vt Wstage

Protos that use SQRT0.S

proto SQRT.S { out xtfloat vd, in xtfloat vs }{xtfloat f0, xtfloat f1, xtfloat f2, xtfloat f3, xtfloat f4, xtfloat f6, xtfloat f7}{
SQRT0.S f2, vs;
CONST.S f3, 0;
MADDN.S f3, f2, f2;
NEXP01.S f4, vs;
CONST.S f0, 3;
ADDEXP.S f4, f0;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f4;
NEXP01.S f3, vs;
MADDN.S f2, f0, f2;
CONST.S f0, 0;
CONST.S f6, 0;
CONST.S f7, 0;
MSUBN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f2, f4;
CONST.S f4, 3;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f2;
MADDN.S f3, f0, f0;
MADDN.S f4, f6, f2;
NEG.S f2, f7;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f7;
MKSADJ.S f2, vs;
NEXP01.S f1, vs;
MADDN.S f1, f0, f0;
NEG.S f3, f7;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f2;
ADDEXP.S f3, f2;
DIVN.S f0, f1, f3;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
proto SQRT.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 vd, in xtfloatx2 vs }{xtfloatx2 f0, xtfloatx2 f1, xtfloatx2 f2, xtfloatx2 f3, xtfloatx2 f4, xtfloatx2 f6, xtfloatx2 f7}{
SQRT0.S f2, vs;
CONST.S f3, 0;
MADDN.S f3, f2, f2;
NEXP01.S f4, vs;
CONST.S f0, 3;
ADDEXP.S f4, f0;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f4;
NEXP01.S f3, vs;
MADDN.S f2, f0, f2;
CONST.S f0, 0;
CONST.S f6, 0;
CONST.S f7, 0;
MSUBN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f2, f4;
CONST.S f4, 3;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f2;
MADDN.S f3, f0, f0;
MADDN.S f4, f6, f2;
NEG.S f2, f7;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f7;
MKSADJ.S f2, vs;
NEXP01.S f1, vs;
MADDN.S f1, f0, f0;
NEG.S f3, f7;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f2;
ADDEXP.S f3, f2;
DIVN.S f0, f1, f3;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
proto SQRT0.S { out xtfloat r, in xtfloat s }{}{
SQRT0.S r, s;
}
proto SQRT0.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s }{}{
SQRT0.S r, s;
}
